name: You're not alone (LightPhoenixNL, ChrisSmits)
description:
You're a small and clever droid on his way home back to his planet. Unfortunately your ship crashed on an unknown planet.

Find your way home by solving some clever puzzles.

But you might not be alone...

Troubleshooting on MacOS
Your mac might won't allow you to open the game because it is not installed trough the Appstore.

You can solve this problem by executing the following steps:

1. Open system preferences
2. Open Security & Privacy
3. Open on "Click anyway"

If you are still having trouble playing this game on mac you can read the following acticle.

https://www.macworld.com/article/672947/how-to-open-a-mac-app-from-an-unidentifi...
